biogs.title: Location: Tradewinds Hotel, Freemantle, Apr 7-10 2025
biogs.information: On behalf of the Loop 3D Foundation and the Loop platform, we present a 3D geological modelling conference to discuss current and future workflows, approaches, applications and downfalls of 3D geological modelling at all scales
biogs.sub_info:
The conference will run over Tue 8th and Wed 9th April.
Half-day workshops will be organised on Mon 7th and Thu 10th April

biogs.title: Scientific themes:
biogs.information:
• 3D geological modelling methods
• integration with geophysical interpretation and modelling
• applications to resources management (water, minerals, tailings)
• applications to minerals exploration

biogs.title: Organising committee
biogs.information:

Dorothy Close - Northern Territory Geological Survey,
Clint Ward - AngloAmerican
Janelle Simpson - Geological Survey of Queensland
Carina Kemp - AWS
Ruth Murdie - Geological Survey of Western Australia
Kerry Turnock - BHP

biogs.title: Registration and abstract submission
biogs.information: Registration information - Registration page - Secured by EventBrite
biogs.sub_info:
Registration costs are capped at AUD$1000
Registration to the workshops requires registration to the conference and will be confirmed on a first-in first-served basis

Delegate (2 days conference) AUD$750
Delegate Early Bird (prior to Dec 15th)AUD$680
Student DelegateAUD$350
Each workshop (half-day)AUD$200
